'''''A World Yet to Be Disenchanted''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must give [[Pitot]] three [[Mysterious Xenochromatic Crystal]]s.

==Gameplay Notes==
* Mysterious Xenochromatic Crystals can be obtained from defeating:
** [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Hat Jellyfish|text=Chassanion &mdash; Trick Bullet}} under the [[Tower of Ipsissimus]].
** Local Legend {{Enemy|Hat Jellyfish|text=Mageblade Corrouge &mdash; With the Purewater Tide It Came}} in the [[Roots of Erinnyes]].
* Only one Mysterious Xenochromatic Crystal can be held at a time, and only one crystal can be obtained per day.

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement references the German phrase {{De|Entzauberung der Welt|{{w|disenchantment}} of the world}}, which is the cultural rationalization and devaluation of religion apparent in modern society.
